sentence.Network_en: He also talked briefly about the isolation he endured while in captivity.
sentence.Network_cn: 他还简单谈及了他被俘期间忍受的孤独。

sentence.Network_en: We shall first look briefly at the historical antecedents of this theory.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们首先应大致看一下该理论在历史上的前身。

sentence.Network_en: There are four basic alternatives; they are described briefly below.
sentence.Network_cn: 有4个基本的选项，简述如下。

entry.def: Something that happens or is done briefly happens or is done for a very short period of time.

example.ex: Guerillas captured and briefly held an important provincial capital.
example.tran: 游击队攻占并短暂控制了一个重要首府。

entry.def: If you say or write something briefly, you use very few words or give very few details.

example.ex: There are four basic alternatives; they are described briefly below.
example.tran: 有4个基本的选项，简述如下。

entry.def: You can say briefly to indicate that you are about to say something in as few words as possible.

example.ex: Briefly, no less than nine of our agents have passed information to us.
example.tran: 总而言之，至少有9名特工向我们传递了情报。

means.word_mean: 2. in a concise manner; in a few words;

sentences.sentence: "the history is summed up concisely in this book"

auth_sentence.content: He was joined briefly by rap star Kayne West.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was joined briefly by rap star Kayne West.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was joined briefly by rap star Kayne West.

auth_sentence.content: O'Neal had it all going for him, briefly.
auth_sentence.res_content: O'Neal had it all going for him, briefly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: O'Neal had it all going for him, briefly.

auth_sentence.content: I shall...in a few pages briefly epitomize what passed.
auth_sentence.res_content: I shall...in a few pages briefly epitomize what passed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I shall...in a few pages briefly epitomize what passed.

Sentence.sentence: The general principle is simple: whenever the body has been in one position for a while, it is good to briefly stretch it in an opposite position.

I don't attend services when I am there, and I have never meditated, there or anywhere; I just take walks and read and lose myself in the stillness, recalling that it is only by stepping briefly away from my wife and bosses and friends that I will have anything useful to bring to them.

Ronald Lee, director of the Centre on the Economics and Demography of Ageing at the University of California, Berkeley, puts it briefly and clearly: "We don't really know what population ageing will be like, because nobody has done it yet.

sentences.en: He served briefly as prime minister from 1920 to 1921.
sentences.cn: 他在1920到1921 年间曾短期出任过首相。

sentences.en: He was kidnapped and briefly detained by a terrorist group.
sentences.cn: 他被一个恐怖组织绑架并短暂拘禁。

sentences.en: She hesitated briefly but quickly regained her poise.
sentences.cn: 她犹豫片刻，但很快恢复了镇静。

means.word_mean: 简单地说；简洁地；简短地

sentences.en: I want to touch briefly on another aspect of the problem.
sentences.cn: 我想简单地谈一下这个问题的另一方面。
他简要地描述了事情的经过。

sentences.en: Briefly describe the product, but do not give any technical details at this stage.
sentences.cn: 简述一下产品情况，但在目前阶段不要提供任何技术细节。

sentences.en: He told me briefly what had happened.
sentences.cn: 他扼要地告诉我所发生的事情。
